channel.title: How to bypass Required info on forms
channel.description:
NOTE: THIS IS BASICLY THIS: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,107998.0.html I JUST FOUND SOME FUN THINGS TO DO WITH IT.
Ever go to signup for something and not want to enter something it requires? Well this will pass the pesky requirment
I will be using the Hotmail signup form as an example.
Go to www.hotmail.com
Click Sign Up (its on the right)
Then click the Free version
Okay now heres the bypass part.. its very easy =p
Find the form that you dont want to enter, now instead of putting in the correct info do this
Hold the ALT key and press 0160
Now you have to make it look real for example if your putting in a fake age you will need to do this
[code] ALT+0160 ALT+0160 ALT+0160 ALT+0160 [/code]
Now click submit.. iv tried this and it works.. The system thinks your putting in something..

item.title: How to bypass Required info on forms
item.dc:creator: @mod_blastman mod blastman
item.description:
@mod_blastman wrote:

[quote=“Bang Train, post:7, topic:168335”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=227934.msg1957587#msg1957587 date=1198825080]
Therefore hotmail has crap forms?
[/quote]

it IS made by mircosoft…[/quote]
And who owns Microsoft…
\Bill Gates//
Proves Something Doesn’t it

Read full topic

item.title: How to bypass Required info on forms
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Of course this only works for crap forms. I’d make sure JS disabled letter inputs for number-only areas, and I’d make sure each input is verified.

Worked for these.

Read full topic
